Events that occurred on 10 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1824 - Author George MacDonald is born.
1941 - Baillie Tolkien is born.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 91c.
1947 - Author and satirist Douglas C. Kenney is born.
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 142a.
1960 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 225.
1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien is interviewed by John Bowen.
2001 – The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring premieres at Odeon Leicester Square, in London.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
Full moon[1]

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ Wayne G. Hammond and Christina Scull (eds), The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion, p. xlviii
